commands.name: .help
commands.description: shows this page

commands.name: .ping
commands.description: returns pong!

commands.name: .echo <arg>
commands.description: returns <arg>

commands.name: .newrole <arg>
commands.description: creates role <arg>

commands.name: .deleterole <arg>
commands.description: deletes role <arg>

commands.name: .iam <arg>
commands.description: adds you to role <arg>

commands.name: .iamn <arg>
commands.description: removes you from role <arg>

commands.name: .whois <arg>
commands.description: returns everyone who has role <arg>

commands.name: .roles
commands.description: will display all the self-assignable roles that exist

commands.name: .Roles
commands.description: will display all the Mod/Exec/XP Assigned roles that exist

commands.name: .poll <arg>
commands.description: starts a yes/no poll where <arg> is the question

commands.name: .poll <arg0> <arg1> <arg2> (up to 12 arguments)
commands.description: starts a poll where <arg0> is the question and the remaining arguments are the options

commands.name: .urban <arg>
commands.description: returns definition from urban dictionary of <arg>

commands.name: .remindmein <x minutes|hours|days> to <subject>
commands.description: create a reminder

commands.name: .showreminders
commands.description: Show all your active reminders and their corresponding messageIDs

commands.name: .deletereminder <arg>
commands.description: deletes a reminder that has a messageId of <arg>. the "messageId" can be obtained by using the ".showreminders" command

commands.name: .load <arg>
commands.description: loads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .unload <arg>
commands.description: unloads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .reload <arg>
commands.description: reloads the commands in the class <arg>. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .exc <arg>
commands.description: executes the command <arg> on the bot server. The classes and their corresponding commands can be determined using the ".help" command.

commands.name: .embed <arg0> <arg1> ...
commands.description:
Allows Minions to post embed messages.
For odd number of arguments the first arg will be used as description in the embed and the rest as field title and content.
For even number there will be no description.

commands.name: .modspeak <arg>
commands.description: Posts the warning message <arg> in embed format. No quotes required with message.

commands.name: .here <filters> ...
commands.description: Displays all users with permissions to view the current channel. Results can be filter by looking for users whose username or nickname on the server contains the substring indicated with any of the included strings or all users if no args are given. Multiple may be entered.

commands.name: .sfu <arg>
commands.description: Returns the calendar description from current semester of <arg>

commands.name: .outline <arg0> [<arg1> <arg2>]
commands.description: Returns outline details of course `<arg0>`. Defaults to current term and section d100. Optionally, you may specify term in `<arg1>` and/or section with `<arg2>`.
